name: Secrets Within
description:
Secrets Within is a puzzle exploration game made in 7 days for the Méliès Game Jam, on the theme "Illusion". 

Lost in a maze with no exit in sight, the player has to learn how to unveil the secrets, as well as uncover the lies and tricks that are being employed to stop you from finding your inner voice... and a way forward.

Credits:
  • Ana Flavia Marques - Art;
  • André Traverso - Art, Story, and Level Design;
  • Bruna Queiroz - Art;
  • Bruno Limenzo - Programming;
  • Felipe Silva - Music, Sound Design & Audio implementation;
  • Haru Sales - Programming;
  • Julio Pagani - Producer and Art;
  • Sarah Cerveira - Art.
Our process:

You can see our whole process in making this game in the link below:

https://bit.ly/secrets-within-GDD
